short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to boost your productivity by blocking and limiting your website usage... by aggressively reminding you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing 314Productivity, a Chrome extension thoughtfully designed by a fellow student facing the challenges of managing time during exam season. Created out of a personal need to balance study and online distractions, this tool has proven effective for me, and I'm excited to share it with others who face similar challenges.

As a student preparing for upcoming exams, I found myself struggling with online distractions. This led me to develop 314Productivity, which has been instrumental in improving my focus and study habits. It's more than just a tool; it's a personal solution to a common problem faced by students worldwide.


Key features:
- Customizable Website and Time Limits: Set your own limits for any website to maintain a healthy balance between work and browsing.

- Flexible Website Blocking: Take control of your browsing by customizing which websites to block and when.

- Aggressive Reminders(also referred to as 'scolds'): Stay on track with a unique reminder system that alerts you with notifications, on-site messages, and audio cues when you exceed your allotted time on specified websites.

Toggle Features On/Off: Customize your experience by easily toggling individual features to suit your needs.


With 314Productivity, you'll find it easier to concentrate on important tasks, reduce distractions, and manage your online time more effectively.

Designed for simplicity and ease of use, 314Productivity lets you customize settings with just a few clicks. Whether you're a student, professional, or casual browser, my extension is tailored to fit your productivity needs.


I hope you can find this tool as helpful as I did.
